data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Ennedi Ouest access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ennedi Ouest, Chad
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 1,732 believers in the state of Ennedi Ouest to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Ennedi Ouest, Chad.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Ennedi Ouest do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Ennedi Ouest, Chad.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Zaghawa people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, encourage the 1,732 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,732 believers in the state of Ennedi Ouest.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ennedi Ouest, Chad has a population of 23,800.

We estimate Ennedi Ouest has 1,732 people who might know Jesus, 4,345 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,722 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 1,732 believers in Ennedi Ouest, Chad how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
